about_the_game:
Synopsis

Poofie Plays God is an open world Puzzle game where your goal is to escape/kill you know who before he or the others kill you; thing is the forest you just moved in suddenly loops around the edges and you can't just leave.
You only have your computer and a map, everything else to lift the curse holding it all together is up to you.

Poofie knows who you are and he needs you. big brother is watching though, and it's his head or yours.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

WHAT YOU GET:

  • FULLY EXPLORABLE 1.1km² wide map

  • Rich story hidden throughout

  • Purchasing inventory to survive

  • 4-5 Different Enemies. Depends on how you see it

  • Shotgun

  • 2 Different endings

  • Extra content available on purchase

  • Shotgun

  • Horror (blood 😨😱😱)

ITS NOT OVER YET

There are planned updates for the game coming shortly after its release. These include:

  • More areas and other content for Singleplayer

  • Multiplayer

  • Level editor & sharing

  • VR support? only if you really want it







    This game is a passion project of mine i started way back in 2021, when i was just 12 years old. I hope it motivates you to make something like this of your own and if there's anything you hate about it, Please tell me; this is my first commercial project and theres no other good way for me to know what i ought to change.

    anyway, have fun!

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Not tested. The game will look terrible and run terrible please do not play this in windows 7

  • Processor: Ryzen 9 / intel core i9
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3090
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: If you happen to have a better computer, the PC Melter setting is there for you
